Based on your preferences and the information provided, I would recommend "Mansfield Park" as one of two movies from this list that you might enjoy.

"Mansfield Park" is a historical drama film directed by Peter Jackson. The film tells the story of Fanny Lee, an ambitious young woman who is determined to make her way in the world. However, when she finds herself in circumstances where she is not able to control her own life and destiny, she realizes that she has been brought up to be better than anyone else, which has made it impossible for her to truly live a happy and fulfilling life.
The film stars Tilda Swinton as Fanny Lee and Emma Watson as the young woman who becomes romantically involved with Fanny Lee. The film also features supporting performances by actors such as Ben Kingsley, John Malkovich, Michael Caine, Ralph Fiennes, Bob Hoskins, Bob Hoskins, Amy Sedaris, etc.
"Mansfield Park" was released in 1972 and has since become a classic film that is widely regarded as one of the greatest historical drama films ever made.

The movie tells the story of a young woman named Clary Fray who discovers that she descends from a line of warriors who protect our world from demons. Together, they must face off against a powerful demon named Lilith who has been wreaking havoc upon all Americans.

The movie tells the story of a wealthy man named Jay Gatsby who is obsessed with winning back his lost love, Daisy Buchanan. With the help of his friend, George Wilson, and his hired driver, Nick Carraway, Gatsby embarks on an elaborate scheme to win back his lost love. However, as the movie unfolds, it becomes clear that Gatsby's elaborate scheme ultimately fails in its quest to win back his lost love.

Together, they must face off against a powerful demon named Lilith who has been wreaking havoc upon all Americans.

Based on the provided preferences, I would recommend the movie "Prometheus" to the user.

"Prometheus" is a science fiction film directed by Christopher Nolan and released in 2012.

The plot of "Prometheus" revolves around a crew sent by NASA to explore and study the planet Europa. However, things take an unexpected turn when the crew discovers that Europa is not just another planet, but it's home to alien beings who have been studying and exploring Earth for centuries. The crew soon realizes that they have stumbled upon a secret that only they hold, and from which the title of the movie is taken.
